tool_description: Trundler provides access to product and historical price data from a range of online retailers.Obtain an API key from the homepage or via [RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/datawookie/api/trundler).To ease access to these data there is also an [R package](https://datawookie.github.io/trundler/) available.
name: Trundler
title: Trundler

api_list.name: get_product_detail
get_stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trundler.p.rapidapi.com/admin/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trundler.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
